title: Veggie Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, marinara sauce, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives
description: Delicious pizza loaded with fresh vegetables and tangy marinara sauce.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, olives, feta cheese, olive oil, oregano
description: Traditional Greek salad with crisp cucumbers, juicy tomatoes, and tangy feta cheese.

title: Fruit Smoothie
description: Refreshing blend of mixed berries, banana, and creamy yogurt, sweetened with honey.

title: Vegetarian Burrito
ingredients: black beans, rice, bell peppers, onions, cheese, salsa, guacamole
description: Hearty burrito filled with seasoned black beans, rice, and fresh vegetables.

title: Quinoa Salad
ingredients: quinoa, cherry tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese, lemon vinaigrette
description: Nutritious salad with protein-packed quinoa, fresh vegetables, and tangy vinaigrette.

title: Mango Lassi
description: Refreshing Indian drink made with ripe mangoes, yogurt, and a hint of cardamom.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: vegetables, tofu, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, sesame oil
description: Healthy stir-fried vegetables and tofu seasoned with soy sauce and aromatic spices.

title: Caprese Salad
ingredients: tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, balsamic glaze
description: Refreshing salad with ripe tomatoes, creamy mozzarella, and fragrant basil leaves.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
ingredients: eggplant, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, breadcrumbs
description: Classic Italian dish with breaded eggplant slices layered with marinara sauce and cheese.

title: Hummus Plate
ingredients: hummus, pita bread, olives, cucumbers, carrots, bell peppers
description: Mediterranean appetizer featuring creamy hummus served with fresh vegetables and pita.
